vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulāti tassa evaṃ hoti aho vatāhaṃ kāya bheda

sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto appeva nāma
chandaṃ pajaha jīvite apekkhaṃ mākāsi imāni te deva caturāsīti
satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ pahoti cāyasmā
sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā
nesohamasmi na meso attāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ evaṃ
jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto
bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi
paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe
itipi natthi paro loko natthi sattā opapātikā natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ
parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṃ
yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti
taṃ dukkhaṃ yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā yadanattā taṃ netaṃ mama
bhikkhave asaṅkhatagāmimaggo pe katamo ca bhikkhave asaṅkhatagāmimaggo idha bhikkhave
atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā
paro loko natthi sattā opapātikā natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ
no bhante dhammā pe rūpe kho bhikkhave sati rūpaṃ
sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa
ettha deva chandaṃ pajaha jīvite apekkhaṃ mākāsi imāni te
yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ
pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāya
na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na
paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto appeva nāma imassa
vuccati bhikkhave asaṅkhatagāmimaggo pe katamo ca bhikkhave asaṅkhatagāmimaggo idha
anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa āpatti thullaccayassāti tena kho pana samayena
na meso attāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ evaṃ passaṃ
kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca
bhante dhammā pe rūpe kho bhikkhave sati rūpaṃ upādāya
loko natthi sattā opapātikā natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākoti
pāpako vipāko diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti so iti paṭisaṅkhāya
loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti
dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto appeva nāma imassa kevalassa
vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā
paṭivirato hoti adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti musāvādā
anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāya cittaṃ
hoti na dosapariyuṭṭhita citta hoti na mohapariyuṭṭhita citta hoti
atha kho sambahula bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavant
viyatta vinīta visārada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammānudhammappaṭipanna sāmīcippaṭipanna anudhammacārī saka
na dosapariyuṭṭhita citta hoti na mohapariyuṭṭhita citta hoti ujugatamevassa

dhamma pe rūpa kho bhikkhave sati rūpa upādāya rūpa
eka samaya bhagavā vesālī viharati mahāvana kūṭāgārasālā atha kho

kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati
bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā
avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti khīṇā jāti
bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko
kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ netaṃ
svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo
imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmīti pe dadeyyāti pe dadeyyunti pe āyasmato
pavesanaṃ sādiyati paviṭṭhaṃ sādiyati ṭhitaṃ sādiyati uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati āpatti
sutvā ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ
anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati manindriyaṃ manindriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati
hoti otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi
upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṃ sammodi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā

agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi
paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati anavajjo ca
vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ
cattāro idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno
bhikkhave sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ
araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā

pamuditassa pīti jāyati pītimanassa kāyo passambhati passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti
dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ
na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na
paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā sabbaṃ taṃ
sāvatthinidānaṃ cattārome bhikkhave jhāyī katame cattāro idha bhikkhave ekacco
jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā
tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati sotena
bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu
kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā ime
iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati
ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacco
dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ
rūpāni dakkhantīti evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito esāhaṃ
sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi
sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi ayaṃ kho
nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā
manasā dhammaṃ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ
iti rūpaṃ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo iti
passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ
purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā sabbaṃ
ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena
sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṃvattati puna
nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā
tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti taṃ
lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena
tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati bhavāsavāpi
upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi
paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve
pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ
vijjā adhigatā avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā tamo vihato āloko
paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ netaṃ
kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati
manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya
adhigatā avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā tamo vihato āloko uppanno
viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ
hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṃ kandati na sammohaṃ
viharati vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ
anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ pe saccaṃ kira tvaṃ
tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū
uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ yaṃnūna mayaṃ
kho bhikkhave pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya
parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṃ
cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe
kho bhikkhave vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi kimhi nu kho sati
upapajjanti te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā
kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṃ kandati na sammohaṃ āpajjati
cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo
pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ
socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṃ kandati na
anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ pe saccaṃ kira tumhe
so ce pavesanaṃ sādiyati paviṭṭhaṃ sādiyati ṭhitaṃ sādiyati uddharaṇaṃ
anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati
te gahapati sikkhitabbaṃ tasmātiha te gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ na
kho bhikkhave vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi kimhi nu kho asati
esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ
nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ

carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya vattha acchādetvā agāra anagāriyaṃ
kamati seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇa imepi candimasūriyā evaṃmahiddhika evaṃmahānubhāva pāṇinā
vācāya vācāya pācittiya upasampanna upasampanna khuṃsetukāmo vambhetukāmo maṅkukattukāma ukkaṭṭha
yampi bhikkhave tathāgata purima jāti purima bhavaṃ purima niketa
hoti na na hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇa idameva saccaṃ
sabyañjana kevalaparipuṇṇa parisuddha brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti sādhu kho pana tathārūpa
ca viharati na ca kiñci loka upādiyati evampi kho
ekantaparipuṇṇa ekantaparisuddha saṅkhalikhita brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya
ekantaparisuddha saṅkhalikhita brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya vattha
tesaṃ pahāna ajjhattameva citta santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati
brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti sādhu kho pana tathārūpa arahataṃ dassana hotīti
āsabha ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti parisā sīhanāda nadati brahmacakka pavatteti puna
saraṇa gacchati dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama dhāretu
kho bhikkhave sati rūpa upādāya rūpa abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi
maraṇāti vā neva hoti na na hoti tathāgata paraṃ
buddha bhagavā rājagaha viharati veḷuvana kalandakanivāpa tena kho pana
yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati na ca kiñci
gotama saraṇa gacchati dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama
anekavihita iddhividhā paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhāpi hutvā
viharati jetavana anāthapiṇḍika ārāma tena kho pana samaya thullanandā
bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupeta saraṇa
sudaṃ aṭṭassara karoti pe eso bhikkhave satta imasmiṃyeva rājagaha
rūpā iṭṭha kantā manāpa piyarūpa kāmūpasaṃhita rajanīya sotaviññeyya sadda
vā neva hoti na na hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti
akovida ariyadhamma avinīta sappurisa adassāvī sappurisadhamma akovida sappurisadhamma avinīta
brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya vattha acchādetvā agāra
iddhividhā paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhāpi hutvā eka
bhikkhu sikkhāpada paññatta hoti tena kho pana samaya bhikkhū
pallaṅkena kamati seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇa imepi candimasūriyā evaṃmahiddhika evaṃmahānubhāva
bhikkhave ariyasāvaka buddha aveccappasāda samannāgata hoti itipi so bhagavā
yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavant abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu ekamantaṃ
tassa kukkucca ahosi pe anāpatti bhikkhu pārājika āpatti thullaccayassāti
parisuddha brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhamma bahussuta honti dhātā vacasā
sabyañjana kevalaparipuṇṇa parisuddha brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhamma bahussuta honti
ārabhati citta paggaṇhāti padahati uppanna pāpaka akusala dhamma pahāna
vigarahi buddha bhagavā pe kathañhi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiya bhikkhunī
disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriya asaṃvuta viharantaṃ
kāya duccarita caritvā vācāya duccarita caritvā manasā duccarita caritvā
hoti yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati na ca
dve dhamma bhāvetabba katama dve samatha ca vipassanā ca

puggalassa vā evañca pana bhikkhave nissajjitabbaṃ pe idaṃ me
āvusoti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ āyasmā sāriputto
āpatti vācāya vācāya pācittiyassa upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ
sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yadidaṃ
vā neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti
kiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā
paccupaṭṭhitā hoti yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissito ca viharati na
paṭissatimattāya anissito ca viharati na ca kiñci loke upādiyati
tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu
hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā idameva saccaṃ
loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi
acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi idaṃ kho no āvuso bhagavā saṃkhittena
kho bhikkhave sati rūpaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi
bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū
parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ
parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā
anissito ca viharati na ca kiñci loke upādiyati evampi
yampi bhikkhave tathāgato purimaṃ jātiṃ purimaṃ bhavaṃ purimaṃ niketaṃ
kāyena duccaritaṃ carati vācāya duccaritaṃ carati manasā duccaritaṃ carati
puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī
paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso
kodho upanāho makkho paḷāso macchariyaṃ pāpikā issā pāpikā icchā
ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ ekantaparisuddhaṃ saṅkhalikhitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā
kukkuccaṃ ahosi pe anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa āpatti thullaccayassāti tena
bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ
appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca
sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṃ
disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ
ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa
puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro sovaggiko sukhavipāko saggasaṃvattaniko iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya

bhagavāti vigarahi buddha bhagavā pe kathañhi nāma te bhikkhave

anicca bhante pe api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi

paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti ime
cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati so
paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso phassapaccayā
vā aniccaṃ vāti aniccaṃ bhante pe api nu taṃ
ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā neva
samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā
bhanteti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi atha kho bhagavā
paraṃ maraṇāti vā na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā
paṭipucchissāmi yathā te khameyya tathā naṃ byākareyyāsi taṃ kiṃ
ātappamanvāya padhānamanvāya anuyogamanvāya appamādamanvāya sammāmanasikāramanvāya tathārūpaṃ cetosamādhiṃ phusati yathāsamāhite
bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu ekamantaṃ ṭhitā
bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati
janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ
sīmaṃ vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi
pariyesati sīmaṃ vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi
no hetaṃ bhante vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ niccaṃ vā
rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu
appicchā pe tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā
bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya mūḷhassa vā
esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsakaṃ maṃ
jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati
jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī
cetasā pe muditāsahagatena cetasā pe upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ
upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati
saccaṃ bhagavāti vigarahi buddho bhagavā pe kathañhi nāma te
neva sumano hoti na dummano upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno
ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā
bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi ekamantaṃ ṭhitā
aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro
rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ
nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā
dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā
anussarati seyyathidaṃ ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi
evaṃ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ
brāhmaṇasammatā te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ
pe muditāsahagatena cetasā pe upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā
paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso phassapaccayā
suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti ime vata
nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā
bhante pe api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya
bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya
yā kāci saññā ye keci saṅkhārā yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ
bhajati araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ
caparaṃ udāyi akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ paṭipadā yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā
dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo
sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā
bhante seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya
sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati paññāya cassa disvā
kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti
niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti aniccaṃ bhante pe api nu
viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā viññāṇaṃ viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ
te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā
bhagavāti vigarahi buddho bhagavā pe kathañhi nāma te bhikkhave
kāmabhoginiyoti assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ
aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo rañño
chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ pe saccaṃ
vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā te ca
piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu
ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni
ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā so satova assasati
asammuṭṭhā sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva
bhante tasmātihānanda eseva hetu etaṃ nidānaṃ esa samudayo esa
saṃyojanaṃ yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo taṃ tattha
natthi mātā natthi pitā natthi sattā opapātikā natthi loke
bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ
sāvakasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato
bahū abhiññāvosānapāramippattā viharanti puna caparaṃ udāyi akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ
na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā hoti ca na
vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā na ca
puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ
pe itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca
ajjhāvasati rājā hoti cakkavattī pe rājā samāno kiṃ labhati
te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ
jhānaṃ pe tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ pe catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati
vuṭṭhāpessāmīti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā
viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati nibbindaṃ virajjati virāgā vimuccati vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ
saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti
aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessati ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkarissati kathañca bhikkhave
ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ
gandhā jivhāviññeyyā rasā kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā
nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacco kāyassa
upasampajja viharati idaṃ kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ
vāti dukkhaṃ bhante yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ api nu
abhiññāvosānapāramippattā viharanti puna caparaṃ udāyi akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ paṭipadā
vā na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā hoti ca
asallīnaṃ upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā sāraddho ca pana me kāyo
duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa
sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa
tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ
no hetaṃ bhante tasmātihānanda eseva hetu etaṃ nidānaṃ esa
abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya pe ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
kāmabhogī dhammena bhoge pariyesati asāhasena dhammena bhoge pariyesitvā asāhasena
pakāsito esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsakaṃ
hoti asallīnaṃ upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā sāraddho ca pana me
yathākammūpage satte pajānāti ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā
bhante abhikkantaṃ bhante seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannaṃ
attāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā
samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ
evaṃ paṭipanno hoti no cassa no ca me siyā
ceva raho ca ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya
sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhānena
ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca
vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati sīmaṃ vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa
kho bhante hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā
yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ khepetvā
duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena
ghānaviññeyyā gandhā jivhāviññeyyā rasā kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā
sammodiṃsu sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu ekamantaṃ nisinnā
jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vāti
seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyoti assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ
bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati
bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca
paṭivirato samaṇo gotamoti iti vā hi bhikkhave puthujjano tathāgatassa
bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ pe
bhagavāti dhamme pe saṅghe pe ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti
sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti ime vata bhonto
sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho
jāyati pītimanassa kāyo passambhati passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati sukhino cittaṃ
gotamoti iti vā hi bhikkhave puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno
katamañcānanda etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca idhānanda bhikkhu
dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ pe tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ pe catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā so satova
samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca
bhante hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
